name: SlayTheCube Remake
description:
This is a remake of one of my first games I ever made. It's not a very good remake but I did what I set out to do with it. I actually finished it I improved the really bad engine I made. (not much I could do without starting over) It was a challenge to finish this in the state that it is in because this engine was so bad I had to redesign a lot of it. Besides all of that it has some fun mechanics that I used and refined in the sequel which I originally stopped developing this game for. (Which I'm in the middle of remaking)

Goal: get to the light blue square and hit fire.
